channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Stevie Nicks and Lindsey Buckingham Call a Truce, Appear on Song Exploder
item.description: 🎶 Fleetwood Mac fans, rejoice! Stevie Nicks and Lindsey Buckingham reunite for a special Song Exploder episode! 🎸 #MusicNews #FleetwoodMacLove

item.title: Now, Now Return With Surprise New 01 EP: Listen
item.description: 🎉 Surprise! @nownowband is back with an EP you need to hear right NOW! 🎶🔥 #NowNow01EP #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Gumm – “One Thing At A Time”
item.description: 🎵 Dance the night away with Gumm's new track "One Thing At A Time"! 🕺💃 #NewMusicAlert #FeelGoodVibes

item.title: Navy Blue Announces New Album The Sword & The Soaring: Hear “Orchards”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy sounds of Navy Blue's upcoming album! 🌊 Listen to the enchanting track "Orchards" now! #NewMusicAlert 💙

item.title: Rock Hall Ceremony Adds Chappell, Donald Glover
item.description: 🎸 Rock Hall just got even more 🔥 with Chappell and Donald Glover joining the lineup! Who's ready to jam out? 🎶 #RockHall #MusicLegends
